Package fi.sdeska.messenger.client

Class MessengerGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
fi.sdeska.messenger.client.MessengerGUI
public class MessengerGUI extends javafx.application.Application
Handles the GUI of the clientside software.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      Initializes the application and displays a view asking for an username.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - the Stage container on which to run this method. Essentially always the primary Stage which is constructed by the platform when launch() is called.
      Throws:
      IOException
      Since:
      1.0

    • startMainView

      public void startMainView(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes and displays the main view of the application.
      Parameters:
      stage - the Stage container in which to create the main view.

    • updateContactPane

      public void updateContactPane()
      Refreshes the contact panel that displays other clients connected to the server. Uses Platform.runLater() so that the GUI is always modified from the JavaFX thread instead of the calling thread (most likely ListeningThread).

    • contactClicked

      public void contactClicked(javafx.scene.control.Button contact)
      The event handler for a contact button getting clicked.
      Parameters:
      contact - the contact whose associated button was clicked.

    • initializeChatView

      public void initializeChatView(String name, boolean show)
      Initializes the contents of the chat panel. Should not be called if the specific client already has an associated messageView.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client to create the messageview for.
      show - whether to show the created message view immdiately or not.

    • initializeChatView

      public void initializeChatView(String name)
      Second parameter defaults to false.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client to create the messageview for.
      See Also:
      • initializeChatView(String, boolean)

    • createMessage

      public void createMessage(String sender, String message)
      Creates a new UI element containing the new message.
      Parameters:
      sender - the name of the user who the message was received from.
      message - the string to display in the GUI.

    • changeShownMessageView

      public void changeShownMessageView(String name)
      Updates the displayed messageview, which contains and displays the messages sent to and received from a specific client.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client whose chat to switch to.

    • getMessageViews

      public Map<String,javafx.scene.layout.VBox> getMessageViews()
      Gets all initialized messageviews. These messageviews either have entries for messages in them, or have been initialized by the user clicking on a contact, but not sending any message.
      Returns:
      map containing usernames and the corresponding messageviews.

    • setActiveChat

      public void setActiveChat(String name)
      Updates the information about the currently active chat.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the user whose chat is currently active.

    • getActiveChat

      public String getActiveChat()
      Gets the username associated with the currently active chat.
      Returns:
      name of the user whose chat is currently active.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
